snippet.title: Plug n Play Games: Lord of the Rings Warrior of Middle Earth
snippet.description:
Help support the channel: https://www.patreon.com/ZCInfinity

A motion-sensing game set in the Lord of the Rings universe that, unlike other "motion sensing" consoles, actually DOES detect where you hold/swing the sword! Fight your way through Middle Earth using your skills and magic to take down every obstacle in your way! And what is your reward for such a perilous journey? ...Your swinging arm will be 5x as large as the other, and your hand will be one large blister.
